meanings.definition: A liqueur flavored with the dried peel of bitter oranges.
meanings.sent1: I added a splash of curacao to the cocktail for a fruity taste.
meanings.sent2: The bartender used curacao to enhance the flavor of the drink.
meanings.sent3: The curacao danced on my taste buds, making the drink delightful.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sip of curacao, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of curacao filled the air, inviting everyone to try the drink.

meanings.sent1: The artist painted the sky with a vibrant curacao hue.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes sparkled with a shade of curacao, captivating everyone.
meanings.sent3: The curacao of the ocean was so intense, it almost seemed unreal.
meanings.sent4: The dress she wore was as striking as the curacao of a tropical sea.
meanings.sent5: The curacao of the flower petals stood out against the green leaves, a beautiful contrast.
